ISSUE.TITLE: Override kubernetes vault token ttl and renewal
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Proposed patch to enable customization of kubernetes vault ttl and token renewal. Source https://github.com/drone/drone/blob/master/plugins/secrets/vault/vault.go#L93:v94 ```diff +if v.ttl == 0 { v.ttl = ttl +} +if v.renew == 0 { v.renew = ttl / 2 +} ``` cc @praxist let me know your thoughts. I just want to make sure there aren't any gotchas that I'm not considering with this patch.
